title: Mystery Mansion
author: Enhanced Eamon Team
intro:
You stand before a dark Victorian mansion. Lightning flashes across the stormy sky. The letter in your pocket speaks of a fortune hidden within... if you can solve the mysteries of the house.

This adventure showcases: Puzzles, Hidden Objects, Container Items, and Quest System.

rooms.name: Grand Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A dusty entrance hall with a grand staircase leading up. A portrait of Lord Blackwood stares down at you. To the east is a library, west is a dining room.

rooms.name: Parlor
rooms.description: An elegant parlor with covered furniture. A grand piano sits in the corner, gathering dust.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Floor-to-ceiling bookshelves line the walls. A large oak desk sits in the center. The air smells of old paper and leather.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A long table set for a dinner party that never happened. Cobwebs drape the chandelier.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A luxurious bedroom with a four-poster bed. A large wardrobe stands against one wall. The locked door to the vault is north.

rooms.name: Secret Vault
rooms.description: You've found it! A small vault room with a pedestal in the center. This is where Lord Blackwood hid his greatest treasure!

items.name: ornate lantern
items.description: A brass lantern that still has oil. It provides a warm glow.

items.name: leather satchel
items.description: A worn leather bag perfect for carrying items.

items.name: old journal
items.description: Lord Blackwood's journal. The last entry reads: 'The numbers dance in moonlight: 7-3-9. Only those who understand the mansion's secrets shall find my fortune.'

items.name: rusty key
items.description: An old iron key with intricate engravings.

items.name: silver candlestick
items.description: An ornate silver candlestick, tarnished with age but still valuable.

items.name: portrait painting
items.description: A portrait of Lord Blackwood. Behind it, you notice strange markings on the wall.

items.name: music box
items.description: A delicate music box that plays a haunting melody. Inside is a small compartment.

items.name: golden locket
items.description: A heart-shaped locket with a photo of Lady Blackwood inside.

items.name: dusty book
items.description: A book about the history of the Blackwood family.

items.name: brass key
items.description: A small brass key hidden under the piano bench.

items.name: silver spoon
items.description: An ornate silver spoon from the dining set.

items.name: family fortune
items.description: A chest filled with gold coins, jewels, and precious stones! You've found Lord Blackwood's hidden fortune!

monsters.name: ghost of Lord Blackwood
monsters.description: A translucent figure in Victorian dress. He seems more sad than scary.

puzzles.description: The vault door has a keyhole and a combination lock.
puzzles.success_message: The key turns with a satisfying click! But the door still won't budge - there's also a combination lock.
puzzles.failure_message: The door is locked. You need the right key.

puzzles.description: A three-digit combination lock on the vault door.
puzzles.success_message: The combination lock clicks open! The vault door swings wide, revealing the secret chamber beyond.
puzzles.failure_message: The combination doesn't work. Maybe there's a clue somewhere in the mansion?

puzzles.description: The piano bench seems oddly positioned.
puzzles.success_message: You find a music box hidden under the piano bench!

dialogues.greeting: Ahh... a visitor. It has been so long since anyone came to my home. I am Lord Blackwood... or what remains of me.

topics.response: My fortune? Yes, I hid it well. Too well, perhaps. I died before I could tell my family where it was. Now I'm bound here until someone worthy claims it.
If you can find my fortune, you may keep it. You'll need to solve the mysteries of the house. My journal holds clues... and my wife's locket was precious to me.
The numbers are important. And search carefully - not everything is in plain sight. My wife loved music boxes...
My dear Lady Blackwood passed before me. She loved music and kept her treasures in the most delicate places.

dialogues.farewell: Good luck, brave soul. May you succeed where I failed in life.

quests.title: The Blackwood Fortune
quests.description: Find Lord Blackwood's hidden fortune. You'll need to search the mansion, solve puzzles, and piece together clues from his journal.
